original_text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men, but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity.
korean_text: 이와 같이 너희도 겉으로는 사람에게 옳게 보이되 안으로는 외식과 불법이 가득하도다

sentences.original_text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 너희도 겉으로는 사람에게 의로운 체 보이지만

sentences.original_text: but within ye are full of hypocrisy
